test_message: Analyze this audio recording for synthetic voice indicators. The audio is a 30-second phone call from a customer requesting account access recovery.

findings.description: Significant high-frequency roll-off above 7kHz and abnormal harmonic structure characteristic of AI synthesis. Lack of natural spectral variation throughout the speech.
Absence of natural breathing intervals and implausibly even phrasing detected, suggesting prosody generation by neural vocoder.
Micro pitch fluctuations with unnaturally consistent pitch tracking, including robotic tone artifacts between phonemes.
Detected GAN-style phase artifacts and subtle waveform discontinuities, matching known neural vocoder signatures.

recommendations: Escalate this incident for manual verification of customer identity.
Implement additional out-of-band authentication before account access recovery.
